text: Biswo Nath Poudel is a Nepali economist and teacher. He became the 18th Governor of the Nepal Rastra Bank on 20 May 2025. The Nepal Rastra Bank is the central bank of Nepal. Before this, he was Vice Chairperson of the [National Planning Commission (Nepal)|National Planning Commission of Nepal. He also worked with different national and international groups. ==Early life and education== Poudel was born in Chitwan District, Nepal. He studied computer science and engineering at China Textile University in Shanghai, China. Later, he became interested in economics and went to the University of California, Berkeley to earn a Masterâ€™s and Ph.D. in Agricultural and Resource Economics. ==Career== Poudel worked as an economic advisor at the Ministry of Finance in Nepal. He also worked with the International Labour Organization and the Millennium Challenge Corporation. From 2012 to 2013, he was on the board of Sanima Bank. He also taught at the Kathmandu University School of Management. ==National Planning Commission== In July 2021, he became Vice Chairperson of the National Planning Commission of Nepal. He worked to improve local production, change the way development is planned, and use data to help make government decisions. ==Governor of Nepal Rastra Bank== On 20 May 2025, he became the 18th Governor of the Nepal Rastra Bank. Three people were listed for the job: Neelam Dhungana Timilsina, Dinesh Bhattarai, and Poudel. He was chosen by the committee. The Supreme Court of Nepal allowed the appointment after legal issues were resolved. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
